title: Practical Strategies for Optimizing Facility Management in Higher Education Institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic facility management concepts and experience in educational institution operations
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training program for university facility managers and educational administrators.

learning_goals: Comparative analysis and application strategies for facility maintenance techniques (outsourcing, in-house management, one-site) in educational institutions
Designing expert outsourcing strategies and technology adoption processes for risk management
Development of facility management policies and implementation plans for improving educational environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
